metadata.synopsis: A dialogue with one of the "guards" in House of Hope. These are Eternal Debters, each one has a story how did they manage to get into Raphael's hands (but not everyone will share it, to keep this in mind for writing all Merregon Debtor characters)These characters see players as "guests" of House of Hope and they don't know anything about players.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. Talk to Hope in House of Hope and promise to helpteleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_HopeIntroduction_Trigger3. Talk to Eternal Debtorteleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_MerregonDebtor04

0.speaker: Immortal Eternal Debtor
0.text: I want to die. Let me die.
